Song.title: Jesus Messiah Christmas Medley
Song.copyright: "Jesus Messiah" by Carlson, Tomlin, Cash, and Reeves ©2008 Vamos Publishing/worshiptogether.com songs/sixsteps Music; "Here I Am to Worship" by Tim Hughes © 2000 Thankyou Music

Arrangement.description: Jesus Messiah, Here I Am To Worship, Angels We Have On High, O Come All Ye Faithful
Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Jesus Mess[E]iah Name above [A2(no3)]all names Blessed Red[E]emer Emmanu[Bsus]el The Rescue for s[E]inners The Ransom from [A2(no3)]heaven Jesus Mess[E/G#]iah [Bsus] Lord of [E]all
BRIDGE: All our [F3m11]hope is in Y[E/G#]ou All our [A2(no3)]hope is in [Bsus]You All the [F3m11]glory to [E/G#]You God [A2(no3)] The Light of the w[Bsus]orld
VERSE 1: [E]Light of the [Bsus]world, You stepped [F#m]down into darkness [E]Opened my [Bsus]eyes, let me s[E/A]ee [E]Beauty that m[Bsus]ade this [F#m]heart adore You [E]Hope of a [Bsus]life spent with [E/A]You
CHORUS: So [B7sus]here I am to w[E]orship, here I am to [B/D#]bow down Here I am to [E/G#]say that You’re my G[A]od You’re altogether l[E]ovely, altogether w[B/D#]orthy Altogether w[E/G#]onderful to [A]me
CHORUS: [E]Glo[C#m]-[F#m]-[B]-[E]-[A]-[B]-ria[B7] [E]In [B]ex-[E]cel-[A]sis [E/B]De-o[B]
Chorus: O [E]come [B]let [E]us [B]a - [E]dore Him O [E]come [B]let [E]us [A]-[E]dore [B]Him [E/G#]O [A]come [E/G#]let [F#m]us [E]a-[B]dore [A F#m]Him [E B]Christ the [E]Lord
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus jesus messiah name above all names blessed redemer emmanuel the rescue for sinners the ransom from heaven jesus messiah lord of all bridge all our hope is in you all our hope is in you all the glory to you god the light of the world verse 1 light of the world you stepped down into darkness opened my eyes let me see beauty that made this heart adore you hope of a life spent with you chorus so here i am to worship here i am to bow down here i am to say that youre my god youre altogether lovely altogether worthy altogether wonderful to me chorus gloria in excelsis deo chorus o come let us a dore him o come let us dore him o come let us adore him christ the lord
